column4: are there any docs on cups for ubuntu? I can't find any one the site
does anyone know how to reenable cups web interface?
is there a user oriented ubuntu channel?
so I can't do anything useful witht that interface
I can not get it to login at all
I set the root passwd just to use that, still did not work
I then tried lppasswd, still did not work
are you on the right port # for the cups server?
I haven't run cups on anything but gentoo in a while; seems to me there's a step to allow a user to admin (I do know I login/password as unprivileged user).  Maybe add that user to some /etc/group?
I even went so far as loggin in as root
it looks like ubuntu has handicapped cups for security reasons.... with no docs on how to unhandicap it
have you been able to use cups on other platforms okay?
this is the first time I have used a printer in 15yrs of computers
haha (15 yrs remark).  Know the feeling.  cups never worked for me .. then one day it did.
I thought ubuntu was supposed to 'just work' hehe.
